title: Clear 1.1.7 – Popular to-do list manager
content: With Clear, to-do list management is clean and simple.   Life is messy. Keep it together with Clear, the amazing app for list-keeping that is unbelievably simple, quick and satisfying to use.   Clear for Mac stores your lists in iCloud so you can use them on your Mac, or on the go using Clear […]

title: Sothink SWF Decompiler 7.4 – Convert SWF to FLA and extract elements

title: Speedy 4.0.4 – Fast and efficient Spotlight alternative
content: Speedy Mac is a little strip that brings you the power to quickly find everything you need for your everyday work: documents, folders, applications, and sites. Speedy Mac also sports multiple text Clipboard capability.   Recent documents, recent folders and recent applications: Open Speedy Mac’s menu: you will be pleasantly surprised to find listed there […]

title: Rocket Video Player 1.3 – Multiformat video player
content: Rocket Player is a multiformat video player with support for AVI, MKV, XVID and much more.   All formats supported: 3gp, 3gp, 3gp2, 3gpp, amv, asf, avi, axv, divx, dv, flv, f4v, gvi, gxf, m1v, m2p, m2t, m2ts, m2v, m4v, mks, mkv, moov, mov, mp2v, mp4, mpeg, mpeg1, mpeg2, mpeg4, mpg, mpv, mt2s, mts, mxf, […]

title: iRip 2.1.8 – Transfer songs, videos, contacts, and more from your iOS device to your Mac
content: iRip (was iPodRip) is the definitive iPod companion application. iRip allows you to get the most out of your iPod, iPhone and iPad — you can transfer music, videos, and books from your iOS device back to your iTunes Library, listen to music directly on your iPod (allowing you to save valuable disk space) and […]

title: Graphical Network Monitor 1.0.5 – See all of your computer’s connections plotted on a map
content: Use Graphical Network Monitor to see all of your computer’s connections plotted on a map. Watch your download and upload speeds on your local network and Internet connection. Explore and understand network and Internet usage for each program running on your computer.   Where in the world is your computer connecting?   Find out which […]

title: Noiseless Pro 1.1.0 – Remove luma and chroma noise from photos
content: Noiseless Pro breathes new life into every photo! When taking photos in low light situations, every smartphone, compact camera, or DSLR creates “noise”, small color or light speckles that can ruin an otherwise cool photo. Noiseless Pro cleans up digital noise fast, with advanced technology to retain sharp details, with one-click operation, and at an […]

title: Fallen: A2P Protocol 1.0 – Turn based, tactical combat and strategy game

title: Acronis True Image 2016 2.0.5531 – Backup and disk management
content: With Acronis True Image 2016 you can assure your Mac is protected by having a full system image backup. Keep all your data safe even if your computer is lost, stolen or damaged. title: ChitChat 1.2.0 – A native Mac app wrapper for WhatsApp Web
content: ChitChat is A Mac app wrapper around WhatsApp’s web client, WhatsApp Web.   Requires WhatsApp Web compatible device (ie. not an iPhone unfortunately, unless you’re jailbroken)   Allows you to receive notification center notifications for new messages, and adds some useful keyboard shortcuts: Start a new conversation ⌘N Search past conversations ⌘F Jump to your […]
